data.title: The leaders who answered the Harvard ‘cold call’
data.meta_description: Nick Greiner, Tony Berg and Bill Ferris from Harvard Business School’s class of 1970 describe the terror and exhilaration of pitting themselves against the world’s best.
data.text:
Edmund TadrosProfessional services editor

Updated May 13, 2022 – 1.36pm , first published at 1.00pm

EmailLinkedInTwitterFacebook

It’s known as the Harvard Business School “cold call”.

After more than half a century, three famous Australian alumni of the university’s fabled Masters of Business Administration program can still recall the mix of excitement and terror they felt when being called upon by a professor to suggest possible solutions to a case study.

Loading...
